preset.name: mac-aarch64-clang-cpu-only
preset.comment: macOS (Apple Silicon / Intel) clang PhysX SDK, CPU only, no Snippets/PVD (for JNI etc.)

cmakeSwitch.name: PX_BUILDSNIPPETS
cmakeSwitch.comment: Disable snippets to avoid OpenGL dependency on macOS

cmakeSwitch.name: PX_BUILDPVDRUNTIME
cmakeSwitch.comment: Disable OmniPVD for minimal SDK build

cmakeParam.name: CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX
cmakeParam.comment: Install path relative to PhysX SDK root

cmakeParam.name: PX_PLATFORM_BIN_NAME
cmakeParam.comment: Output dir in bin/ (mac.aarch64 instead of linux.x86_64)
